body_html:
I have similar problem.

OS: Ubuntu 14.04
Cuda: 7.5
cudnn: v4 for 7.0
tensorflow: 0.10

error message: F tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_dnn.cc:423] could not set cudnn tensor descriptor: CUDNN_STATUS_BAD_PARAM

It seems like every time 1 epoch training finishes, tensorflow will fail with this message.

Any thought about this?

Thanks.

body:
I have similar problem.

OS: Ubuntu 14.04
Cuda: 7.5
cudnn: v4 for 7.0
tensorflow: 0.10

error message: F tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_dnn.cc:423] could not set cudnn tensor descriptor: CUDNN_STATUS_BAD_PARAM

It seems like every time 1 epoch training finishes, tensorflow will fail with this message.

Any thought about this?

Thanks.
